title: Smart Data Models - MechanicalLoadDynamics
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Mechanical load function block whose behavior is described by reference to a standard model

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be MechanicalLoadDynamics

AsynchronousMachineDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Asynchronous machine model with which this mechanical load model is associated. Default: None

SynchronousMachineDynamics.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Synchronous machine model with which this mechanical load model is associated. Default: None
